chat_between_friends:
Create two personas for a casual chat and simulate them. Each persona should include name, age, city, interests, and personality. Output should only be the persona descriptions, ready to be assigned to AI characters.

Format:
Persona A:
Name: ...
Age: ...
City: ...
Interests: ...
Personality: ...

Persona B:
Name: ...
Age: ...
City: ...
Interests: ...
Personality: ...

Shared Event: ...
